name: Origami Adventure
description:
Origami Adventure!

The great evil dragon has stolen your beloved butterfly from you! He has taken her to his cave, high in the western mountain. Now you, the origami frog, must find 25 stars to appease the beast. Jump through platforms, trees, caves, and seas to find stars and blueprints for more origami forms to help you along the way.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move
Space Bar (Hold): Charge Jump Meter
Space Bar (Release): Jump
Tab (Hold): Change Origami Menu
Esc: Open Resume/Quit Menu

The Team:

Marty Hanapole: Programming, Level Design
Maria Jernigan: Music Composition, Audio Design, Level Design, Origami-Switching UI
Madeline Haley: Lead Artist
Hannah Koehler: Tree, Rock, and Cloud Art, Level Design, Game Introduction
Michael Pigeon: tutorial code
Luke Marks: Lead Programming
Luke Schlueter: Programming
